display_long_description:
· Proper way to wear the eye belt
> Educate people on how to wear seatbelts properly. The seatbelts must be worn to ensure they are properly attached to the body, and the shoulder straps should go past the center of the chest, not the neck.

· Accident experience with and without seatbelts
> Through VR, students experience accident situations when wearing seatbelts and when not wearing seatbelts, and learn the importance of seatbelts vividly.

· correct bus ride
> When waiting for the bus, learn how to board safely only while stopped, and train the rules of conduct to prevent accidents while boarding.

· How to use an emergency hammer in case of a bus fire
> In the event of a bus fire, experience how to break windows and escape in a virtual environment using an emergency hammer.

· How to get off the bus in peace
> When you get off the bus, look around, check the surrounding vehicles after stopping, and learn how to get off safely. Especially when you get off the side of the road, make sure you are careful about vehicles coming from behind.
